name: Gregory Miwok 18 Daypack - Unisex
description: The Miwok 18 hugs your body and stays stable for fast hiking, trail running or scrambling missions. It features BioSync suspension: flexible tendons connect the shoulder harness and waistbelt to the pack, stretching and retracting to move the whole system with your body.BioSync suspension offers a close fit that doesn’t restrict your movement.Mesh on waist, shoulder straps and back panel wicks moisture to keep you cool.Hydration system-ready with easy external access, smart tube routing and a mouthpiece keeper clip on shoulder harness.2 waistbelt pockets.Sunglasses stash on shoulder harness.2 external side pockets and 1 internal zippered top pocket with zippered mesh security compartment.Zippered top pocket has a soft lining to protect your sunglassesWide clamshell access to main compartment.Expandable front pocket with bungee closure holds extra layers.Designed to carry up to 9kg/20lb.
